00009 template <typename T, int N>
00010 struct to_python_value< ndarray::Vector<T,N> const & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00011     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::Vector<T,N> const & x) const {
00012         handle<> t(PyTuple_New(N));
00013         try {
00014             for (int n=0; n<N; ++n) {
00015                 object item(x[n]);
00016                 Py_INCREF(item.ptr());
00017                 PyTuple_SET_ITEM(t.get(), n, item.ptr());
00018             }
00019         } catch (error_already_set & err) {
00020             handle_exception();
00021             return NULL;
00022         }
00023         return t.release();
00024     }
00025     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const { return &PyTuple_Type; }
00026 };
00027 
00028 template <typename T, int N>
00029 struct to_python_value< ndarray::Vector<T,N> & > : public detail::builtin_to_python {
00030     inline PyObject * operator()(ndarray::Vector<T,N> & x) const {
00031         return to_python_value< ndarray::Vector<T,N> & >()(x);
00032     }
00033     inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const { return &PyTuple_Type; }
00034 };

00036 namespace converter {
00037 
00038 template <typename T, int N>
00039 struct arg_to_python< ndarray::Vector<T,N> > : public handle<> {
00040     inline arg_to_python(ndarray::Vector<T,N> const & v) :
00041         handle<>(to_python_value<ndarray::Vector<T,N> const &>()(v)) {}
00042 };
00043 
00044 template <typename T, int N>
00045 struct arg_rvalue_from_python< ndarray::Vector<T,N> const & > {
00046     typedef ndarray::Vector<T,N> result_type;
00047 
00048     arg_rvalue_from_python(PyObject * p) : _p(python::detail::borrowed_reference(p)) {}
00049 
00050     bool convertible() const {
00051         try {
00052             tuple t(_p);
00053             if (len(t) != N) return false;
00054             _p = t;
00055         } catch (error_already_set) {
00056             handle_exception();
00057             PyErr_Clear();
00058             return false;
00059         }
00060         return true;
00061     }
00062 
00063     result_type operator()() const {
00064         tuple t = extract<tuple>(_p);
00065         if (len(t) != N) {
00066             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "Incorrect size for ndarray::Vector.");
00067             throw_error_already_set();
00068         }
00069         result_type r;
00070         for (int n=0; n<N; ++n) {
00071             r[n] = extract<T>(t[n]);
00072         }
00073         return r;
00074     }
00075 
00076 private:
00077     mutable object _p;
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename T, int N>
00081 struct extract_rvalue< ndarray::Vector<T,N> > : private noncopyable {
00082     typedef ndarray::Vector<T,N> result_type;
00083 
00084     extract_rvalue(PyObject * x) : m_converter(x) {}
00085 
00086     bool check() const { return m_converter.convertible(); }
00087     
00088     result_type operator()() const { return m_converter(); }
00089 
00090 private:
00091     arg_rvalue_from_python< result_type const & > m_converter;
00092 };
